flawed_nl_solution:
Sue has 15-8 = <<15-8=7>>7 books left after returning at the library.
Sue returned 6/3 = <<6/3=2>>2 movies to the library.
Sue had 6-2 = <<6-2=5>>5 movies left.
Sue had 7+9 = <<7+9=16>>16 books after checking out at the library.
Sue has 16+5 = <<16+5=21>>21 movies and books combined.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
